data.author: kaaku

changelog.release_notes: - add App icon and App Glance message for App list on Pebble OS4.0
Add display of day of month on Pebble Time
- fix bugs of another url of CarbonFin Outliner

ver.1.5
- add support for Pebble Time Round

ver.1.4
- fix version up problem from previous version.1.3.
  please setting URLs again.

ver.1.3
- App name changed to "Checklist with Web"
- add support checklist web service "Wunderlist"

ver.1.2
- fix unable load bug when url includes space charactor

ver.1.1
- add support import plain text list from server like as dropbox
- modify minor design

data.description:
Do you have checklist on Wunderlist or CarbonFin outliner or dropbox ?
This app import your checklist data from Wunderlist or CarbonFin outliner, or plain text list on web file server like as dropbox.

* CarbonFin outliner is an iOS outliner App.


* Features
  - import checklist from web service , Wunderlist or CarbonFin Outliner or dropbox .
  - can reload recent 5 checklists quickly
  - display current time
  - display checked item number and all item number

* How to operate
  - select cursor with up/down button
  - at item line, check/uncheck with select button
  - at checklist name line, reload with select button, delete with long push select button
  - at bottom line of named "Delete Checked", delete all checked items with select button

* How to import checklist from web
 - see config file of this App

* Note
 - Please set checklist URL again after version up from  ver.1.3 or lower .
data.title: Checklist with Web
